import React from 'react' import classes from './exploreMenu.module.css' import { menu_list } from '../../Assets/frontend_assets/assets' function ExploreMenu({category, setCategory}) { return (

Explore our menu.

Lorem, ipsum dolor sit amet consectetur adipisicing elit. Sint at unde ullam saepe iusto ex atque

{ menu_list.map((item, index) => (
setCategory(prev => prev===item.menu_name?'All':item.menu_name)} key={index} className={classes.explore_menu_list_item}>

{item.menu_name}

)) }
) } export default ExploreMenu
